Entry.Name: HSTS not preloaded
Entry.Description: If the HSTS header is preloaded but the webserver does not have a valid certificate, the user will not be able to access the target website.

Mitigation.Textual: Check if your certificate has expired or it is not valid. If it is not valid, get a new certificate and deploy it on your server. If it has expired, renew it and deploy it on your server.
